MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn, affecting properties in Cleghorn Drive and surrounding streets.  Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to  repair a damaged underground cable located in Cleghorn Drive affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.59pm on Wednesday 24th November 2020.
